actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Reported by the Committee on Financial Services. H. Rept. 110-917.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 592.

official_title: To amend the Expedited Funds Availability Act to provide a 1-time adjustment in certain dollar amounts to account for inflation over the 21 years since the enactment of such Act, to provide for future adjustments of such amounts on a regular basis, and for other purposes.
short_title: Expedited Funds Availability Dollar Limits Adjustment Act of 2008

summary.text: Expedited Funds Availability Dollar Limits Adjustment Act of 2008 - Amends the Expedited Funds Availability Act to increase: (1) from $100 to $175 the amount of a federal, state, or local government check that is available for next business day withdrawal; and (2) from $400 to $700 the maximum cash amount of non-government checks available for 5 p.m. withdrawal.Directs the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to make cost-of-living adjustments to such amounts every five years.

titles.title: Expedited Funds Availability Dollar Limits Adjustment Act of 2008
Expedited Funds Availability Dollar Limits Adjustment Act of 2008

To amend the Expedited Funds Availability Act to provide a 1-time adjustment in certain dollar amounts to account for inflation over the 21 years since the enactment of such Act, to provide for future adjustments of such amounts on a regular basis, and for other purposes.
